Overview[]: Wesley is a brave and grateful man. He is shown to have disapproved of Gregory 's leadership and is thankful to Maggie when she takes charge. Like many others, he goes along with joining the fight against the Saviors , fighting until his unfortunate demise.
Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Wesley's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Wesley joined a community called the Hilltop Colony where he became one of the supply runners.
Death[]: Killed By Negan Smith (Indirectly Caused) Simon (Caused) The Saviors (Alive, Caused) During the Saviors' attack on the Hilltop, Wesley is injured by one of the Saviors' tainted weapons. The following night, Wesley succumbs to the infection and reanimates. Daryl Dixon (Zombified) As a zombified Wesley attacks the Hilltop residents, he is stabbed in the head by Daryl.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Wesley has killed: Possibly a few unnamed Saviors At least 1 unnamed Hilltop resident (Infected) Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Gallery[]: For more images of Wesley, please visit Wesley (TV Series)/Gallery .
Trivia[]: For an unknown reason, Wesley is not mentioned in the Talking Dead memorial for " Do Not Send Us Astray ".
